David Parks, Craftsman is an merchant in Harmattan, city in the Antique Plateau.

Description[ | ]

David is the camping wares supplier for Harmattan, trading in tents, backpacks, and other supplies.

Price Modifiers

David Parks, Craftsman is affected by Harmattan Market's price modifiers. Items cost 1.3x as much to buy from this store.

If the player hands the evidence from Purifier to Sekiguchi Meiko, the buy modifier is restored to the normal 1.0x rate.

Quests[ | ]

David gives the quest Need: Angel Food Cake.

Inventory[ | ]

Guaranteed Stock

Items Gold Ingot (5-8) Adventurer Backpack (1) Nomad Backpack (1) Simple Tent (1) Improvised Bedroll (1) Waterskin (2-3) Fishing Harpoon (1) Mining Pick (1) Flint and Steel (1-2) Cooking Pot (1) Explorer Lantern (1-2) Old Lantern (1-2) Virgin Lantern (1-2) Thick Oil (2-4) Coil Lantern (1) Power Coil (2-3) Alchemy Kit (1) Crystal Powder (2-3)

Random Stock 1

This drop table will be rolled 2 to 4 times.

ItemsChance * Hide (2-4)14.29% (37%) Scaled Leather (1-2)14.29% (37%) Jerky (2-3)14.29% (37%) Alpha Jerky (2-3)14.29% (37%) Bandages (6-8)14.29% (37%) Antidote (4-6)14.29% (37%)

* The second number indicates the total chance of receiving the drop at least once, from an average 3 rolls.

Random Stock 2

This drop table will be rolled 3 times.

ItemsChance * Prospector Backpack (1)25% (58%) Alchemist Backpack (1)25% (58%) Strongbox Backpack (1)25% (58%) Trader Backpack (1)25% (58%)

* The second number indicates the total chance of receiving the drop at least once, from 3 rolls.

Random Stock 3

This drop table will be rolled 3 times.

ItemsChance * Camouflaged Tent (1)20% (49%) Fur Tent (1)20% (49%) Luxury Tent (1)20% (49%) Mage Tent (1)20% (49%) Plant Tent (3-7)20% (49%)

* The second number indicates the total chance of receiving the drop at least once, from 3 rolls.
